description:
Exports: Net mass

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
51000 Foreign trade

Definition:
As a rule, the weight of a commodity is indicated in tonnes
(= 1,000 kg) with one decimal place. It is given as the net
mass of the commodity, that is, the mass of the commodity
net of all packaging.

name: Exports: Net mass
